sense.def:
Rules
so navodila, ki nam povedo, kaj smemo in česa ne.

seg.quote: It is against the rules to keep pets.
If she breaks the rules, she will be punished.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
the rule
, velja za normalno.

To rule a country
pomeni nadzorovati dogajanja v neki državi.

seg.quote: At this time Denmark ruled over Southern Sweden.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
ADJUNCT
or
REPORT VB

seg.quote: I was asked to rule on the case of a British seaman.
The Supreme Court ruled that there was no federal offence involved.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj dogaja
as a rule
, se dogaja ponavadi.

seg.quote: Doctors are not as a rule trained in child rearing.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo, ki je pristojen za odločanje,
bends the rules
, nekaj dovoli, čeprav je to v nasprotju s pravili.

To rule out an idea or course of action
pomeni zavreči neko zamisel ali ukrep, ker je nemogoč ali neustrezen.

Kadar ena stvar
rules out another
, se zaradi nje ne more zgoditi nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: The radio was on, effectively ruling out conversation.
